message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can negotiate from here.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think I can do better than that. I'll give you a chance to make a better offer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still confident I can get a better deal than this.
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze you a bit more
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to meet you at 5000. Can you meet me there?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not giving up too much. Let's see if you can meet me here.
You're trying to squeeze me, I'll squeeze back
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going below 4200.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not giving up too much. Let's try to wrap this up.
You're getting desperate, I'll try to take advantage
I'm not desperate, I'm just being cautious. I'll give you 3800, but that's as low as I'll go.
I'm not going to give you any more than this. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to protect my own interests.
You're not budging, I'll take a firmer stance
I'm not going to give you 68% of the remaining money. I'll give you 3600, but that's as low as I'll go.
I'm not going to give you any more than this. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to protect my own interests. Let's try to wrap this up.
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
Fine, I'll accept your final offer. I'm not going to risk going to 0.
